text: Alʙatta Alloh ʙar sumo harom gardonidaast, on cizero ki ʙar sumo zarar meorad, ʙa monandi xudmurda, xun va gusti xuk va on ciro, ki dar vaqti zaʙh nomi ƣajri Alloh ʙar on ʙixonand. Va az fazlu rahmati Alloh ast ʙar sumo, ki muʙoh gardonid xurdani cizhoi haromsudaro, hangome ki macʙur savad, ʙa qadri zarurat va az had naguzaronad, pas ʙar vaj gunohe nest. Ba durusti, Alloh omurzanda va ʙaxsojanda ast
